content: Just beyond the shrine, there's a small area for you to explore. As you step toward the Keeper's Shrine, you'll likely see the golden box on the log just behind it. Go here to pick up a Celestial Taiyi Pill.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Furnace_Valley_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Furnace Valley Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Rakshasa Palace'.
The content is as follows:
Just beyond the shrine, there's a small area for you to explore. As you step toward the Keeper's Shrine, you'll likely see the golden box on the log just behind it. Go here to pick up a Celestial Taiyi Pill.
